title: A Field in Asia
creator_credit: George Wickremesinghe, Jehangir Bhownagary, Ceylon Government Film Unit and United Nations
brief_description: Agricultural extension officers of F.A.O. encourage Asian farmers to use better methods to increase harvests. An example in Ceylon shows use of better seed and improved sowing, cultivating and fertilising. Original music by Ravi Shankar.
creator_credit_for_label: George Wickremesinghe, Jehangir Bhownagary, Ceylon Government Film Unit and United Nations
